name: Home Match
description: The Program matches community members looking to rent a bedroom or Accessory Dwelling Unit with home providers looking for extra income or companionship. They make introductions between home seekers and home providers based on communication style, lifestyle preferences and other aspects of social compatibility. They interview, screen, run background checks, and support you throughout the process of matching and living together. This is a no-cost service that is available now.

howToGetIt: Call the mainline line for more information.
keywords: i am not currently experiencing homelessness, but i am looking for a long-term affordable housing unit.
